entry.content:
Description

[EuroPython 2023 ‚Äî Forum Hall on 2023-07-20]

https://ep2023.europython.eu/session/lightning-talks-thursday

Enjoy Thursday's lightning talks, hosted by Omotola Omotayo ‚¨áÔ∏è 00:00 Welcome to Thursday's Lightning Talks 00:28 Being Nice ‚Äî Daniele Procida 07:41 I am Biased ‚Äî Filipa Andrade 11:46 What APL Taught Me about Python ‚Äî Rodrigo Gir√£o Serr√£o 16:54 All You Need to Know About Federated Learning in 2 Minutes ‚Äî Sarah Diot-Girard 21:43 A Different (Travel) Program ‚Äî Riccardo Polli 23:40 fstring.help Or: How I Bought Yet Another Domain ‚Äî Florian Bruhin 28:57 Community Conference / Events Announcements & Celebration! 35:49 Pick a Side: Planet or Profit? ‚Äî Chiin-Rui Tan 41:18 Isolated Python Functions ‚Äî Meder Kamalov 45:12 Gambatte Terminal ‚Äî Vincent Michel

Signing up is on a first-come-first-served basis. The queue is reset every day in the morning.

The presenter may talk about / present (almost) everything with certain boundaries. And each presentation is not longer than five minutes and full of fun!
